info.author: Nikita Sivakov
info.description:
Pytest Falcon fixtures
======================

Pytest fixtures for the `Falcon
Framework <https://github.com/falconry/falcon>`__.

|Build Status| |Coverage Status| |Python versions| |PyPi|

Installation
------------

.. code:: python

    pip install pytest-falcon-fixtures

Before using it you must define ``api`` that returns instance of your
``falcon.API`` app

.. code:: python

    import pytest

    from yout_application import create_api

    @pytest.fixture
    def api():
        return create_api()

Provided fixtures
-----------------

client
~~~~~~

.. code:: python

    def test_something(client):
        got = client.get('/your_url/42/')  # returns json of response and automatically check response status code
        assert got == {'awesome': 'response'}

        response = client.get('/your_url/100500/')  # returns testing response object and skip status code check
        assert response.status_code == 400
        assert response.json = 'Invalid id'

.. |Build Status| image:: https://travis-ci.org/cryptomaniac512/pytest-falcon-fixtures.svg?branch=master
   :target: https://travis-ci.org/cryptomaniac512/pytest-falcon-fixtures
.. |Coverage Status| image:: https://coveralls.io/repos/github/cryptomaniac512/pytest-falcon-fixtures/badge.svg?branch=master
   :target: https://coveralls.io/github/cryptomaniac512/pytest-falcon-fixtures?branch=master
